message.content:
cs.CV, cs.DS, cs.CG, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with image segmentation, which is a problem in computer vision (cs.CV). The optimization scheme proposed in the paper involves finding correlation clusterings in planar graphs, which falls under the category of algorithms and data structures (cs.DS) and computational geometry (cs.CG). The use of weighted perfect matching as a subroutine suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the field of combinatorial optimization (cs.CO). Finally, the paper's focus on producing high-quality segmentations using optimization techniques suggests that it may also be relevant to the field of artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
